name: Nami
text: On Play: Return 1 or more Dons to your don deck. Attached 2 of your rested don to 1 of your leader or Character.

effect.text: Return 1 or more Dons to your don deck. Attached 2 of your rested don to 1 of your leader or Character.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and 'SPECIAL Q' in the top right corner, which may indicate a promotional or special edition card. The rarity is marked as 'SP' in the bottom right corner.
